mapper.insert:
UUID
insert into sea_flink (sortrank, url, webname, msg, email, logo, dtime, ischeck) values (#{sortrank,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{url,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{webname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{msg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{logo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ischeck,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update sea_flink set sortrank = #{sortrank,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, url = #{url,jdbcType=CHAR}, webname = #{webname,jdbcType=CHAR}, msg = #{msg,jdbcType=CHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=CHAR}, dtime = #{dtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ischeck = #{ischeck,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select id, sortrank, url, webname, msg, email, logo, dtime, ischeck from sea_flink
